statements: DELETE FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_rating = 5 AND survey_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_rating >= 4 AND survey_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM FeedbackSurveys WHERE survey_id = 1 AND customer_id = 100;
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE survey_id = 101 AND feedback_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM feedback_survey WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND service_rating >= 4;
DELETE FROM Question WHERE survey_id = 200 AND question_text = 'What is your favorite color?';
DELETE FROM feedback_ratings WHERE survey_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500
DELETE FROM customer_responses WHERE survey_id = 200 AND response_date < '2022-01-01'
